Author: tofu_snob
Text: It's been 7 years for me. I hardly know what my natural, unpuffy face looks like. My teeth are starting to discolor and chip, and my weight is more and more unpredictable. I hate thj is disease.

Author: thisismyedaccount
Text: I'm so sorry this has been your experience. No super great advice, but bulimia ruined my life for a very long time. I b/p'd between 3-10 times a day from ages 14-17, and then about 2-4x a week for three years after that. My teeth went to shit, my face was always puffy, and I had a series of what I think were tiny seizures because I was on Wellbutrin.  &#x200B;  Cut to two years later, and most of those side effects are gone. No more acid reflux, no more facial puffing. I had a shit ton of expensive dental work done and my teeth are miles better than they were. Cutting the purging down to once or twice a week is extremely beneficial, even.
